name: Formula One 04
summary:
赛车竞技的最高峰
真实体验Formula 1TM
共享Formula 1TM的竞技精神！

The only official Formula One game around gets updated for the 2004 season, with a fully-fledged career mode.

FORMULA ONE 04 continues to refine the Grand Prix experience. It's the only FORMULA ONE game and still totally exclusive to PlayStation 2. With circuits including the new Bahrain and China tracks, the latest cars, up-to-date driver rosters and a host of new gameplay modes and features, including a Career mode and historic cars.

简介来自Playstation网站。
